==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|がい|こく|ご|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
[[外国]] ([[がいこく]], ''[[gaikoku]]'', "foreign country") + [[語]] ([[ご]], ''[[go#Japanese|go]]'', "language, -ese").

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|がいこくご|y=o|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|がいこくご|kyu=外國語}}

# {{lb|ja|linguistics|sort=かいこくご'}} a [[foreign language]]

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|母国語|ぼこくご}}
